extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message: Get that super deal feeling every time you shop online with instant discounts on all your favourites.
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.

action_popup.subtitle.message: You're about to be one of the savviest shoppers on the planet with all the coupons coming your way.

action_popup.back_to_publisher.description: Back button text with publisher name placeholder

aa_start_popup.title.description: Main heading for auto-apply start popup

aa_start_popup.primary_button.description: Primary button text for auto-apply popup

aa_start_popup.secondary_button.description: Secondary button text for auto-apply popup

aa_progress.stop_with_savings.description: Stop button text when savings found

aa_progress.stop_no_savings.description: Stop button text when no savings found

aa_progress.savings_message_1.message: You have saved $1 so far! You're flying, keep on going

aa_progress.savings_message_2.message: Crushing it! You've saved $1 so far – but we're not done yet!

aa_progress.savings_message_3.message: Nice! You've saved $1 so far – still trying to find you the best.

aa_progress.no_savings_message_1.message: Your savvy shopping skills are about to pay off BIG TIME.

aa_progress.no_savings_message_2.message: You're ahead of the pack – more deals are coming your way!

aa_progress.no_savings_message_3.message: Hang tight, saver! The best deals are just about to land.

aa_progress.no_savings_message_4.message: Great things take time and are worth the wait.

aa_progress.no_savings_message_5.message: What a savings pro! Keep your pockets full as we find even better for less.

aa_finish.success_message.description: Success message showing savings amount and partner name

aa_finish.already_best_price.message: You already have the best price!
aa_finish.already_best_price.description: Message shown when no better discount is found

aa_error.generic_error.message: Sorry, we got a bit stuck.
aa_error.generic_error.description: Generic error message shown when auto-apply encounters a problem

aa_error.checkout_button.description: Button text to proceed to checkout after error

aa_stop_confirmation.success_message.message:
Congrats! You saved
$1
so far with $2
aa_stop_confirmation.success_message.description: Success message showing current savings and partner name

aa_stop_confirmation.keep_searching.description: Button text to continue searching for better deals

aa_stop_confirmation.secondary_button.description: Button text to stop and keep current savings

coupons_popup.copied_message.description: Success message when coupon is copied

copied_popup.success_message.description: Message shown when code is copied to clipboard

fab_popup.default_message.description: Default message shown in FAB when no specific message is provided

fab_popup.preparing_coupons.description: Message shown when auto-apply is initializing coupons

fab_popup.searching_coupons.description: Message shown when system is searching for available coupons
